name: Whadda Media
tag_list: social-media, digital-marketing, social-monitoring, publishing, facebook-apps, facebook-pages, entertainment-industry, bars, resturants
overview:
Whadda Media, a young digital development agency, has funded and developed BeeLiked.com, a user friendly web and mobile marketing application targeted at small to medium sized enterprises that want the same digital marketing advantages as larger companies, but without the expense of hiring large teams of people.

The web application integrates with Twitter, Facebook Pages, Yelp, Qype, FourSquare, and other networks where consumers are engaging with businesses and brands.

BeeLiked has been described as the ‘Swiss Army Knife of digital marketing’, as it not only brings together all elements of social media marketing, but it also shows venues their online reviews, has a competition manager, QR code manager, analytic tools, link tracking and customer service management tools for teams. All of this, combined with a very easy to use interface and the ability to tier staff permissions in order to allow businesses to keep close control over Social Media assets and messaging.
